vsParam:
Ho ho! Anis, I've heard of it.
I am surprised that you'd worry about the assignment.

I am.
I feel ashamed, but I really can't manage it on my own...

Hmm, what's there to be ashamed of?
That's when you ask for help from others.
You are more than welcomed to ask for our help.
Like Peppermint would actually do anything...

Hmm! [px] bullies me!
Of course I'll help!

Hehe, thank you, guys.
I am counting that on you two.

What is it,
a flower seedling?

Yes. My assignment is to study the habits of plants,
but this seedling seems malnourished and droopy...

Oh...
Why don't you just muddle through assignments like that?

No way. As an apprentice sage, I can't muddle through!
Besides, this assignment was from Ru Sensei.

Ah, er... my condolences... No one can muddle through
works assigned by Ru Sensei, a perfectionist...

Uh... What to do then?
Shall we go and find another healthier flower?

No need... I heard that the item "Round Feces"
can make plants thrive.

I see.
You want that item, right?

Yes.
[px], can you help me with it?

Really!?
I am counting on you then.

Hehe, typical [px].
I am counting on you then.
